author.name: scifr0g
author.description: Majored in statistical physics. My interests : Complex Systems, Social Network Analysis, Information Visualization, Econophysics. | mainly links and RT's

author.name: Justin Yeakel
author.description: Assistant professor at UC Merced & Omidyar fellow at the Santa Fe Inst. Complex systems, food webs, paleontology, metapopulations, isotopes, and HP Lovecraft.

facebook.title: The Landscape of Complex Networks. (arXiv:1204.6376v1 [stat.ME])
facebook.summary:
Authors:  E. Weinan, Jianfeng Lu, Yuan Yao

Topological landscape is introduced for networks with functions defined on
the nodes. By extending the notion of gradient flows to the network setting,
critical nodes of different indices are defined. This leads
